description: This file defines a mock implementation of a fan control cluster, including attributes for fan mode, with methods to get/set fan mode and generate attribute data.

classes.name: MockFanControlCluster
classes.description: A mock cluster class for controlling and simulating fan mode attributes in a device.

methods.name: get8BitValue
methods.description: Converts an integer value to a single-byte array representation.

methods.name: getAttributeData
methods.description: Retrieves the attribute data for a given attribute info, specifically returning the fan mode value as an 8-bit array.

methods.name: setFanMode
methods.description: Sets the fan mode and triggers an attribute report if the value has changed.

methods.name: MockFanControlCluster
methods.description: Constructor initializing the mock cluster with specific parameters and attributes.
